import React, { useState } from 'react' import styles from './CommonCard.style' import {NavLink} from 'react-router-dom' import { StyleRoot } from 'radium' import ProcessButton from '../Buttons/ProcessButton' const CommonCard = (props) => { const icon = require(`../../assets/${props.src}`).default; const [isHovered, setisHovered] = useState(false); // const icon = require(`../../assets/icon-free-subj-1.png`).default; return (
setisHovered(true)} onMouseLeave={() => setisHovered(false)} style={styles().containerCard}>
{props.title}
{props.content}
) } export default CommonCard
